meanings.definition: More twin-like in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The twinier puppies looked almost identical.
meanings.sent2: The twinier siblings shared the same birthday.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the twinier outfits the twins wore.
meanings.sent4: The twinier trees in the forest seemed to mirror each other perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The twinier relationship between the two friends was evident to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The twinier scarf was softer than the other one.
meanings.sent2: Her hair looked twinier after she braided it.
meanings.sent3: The twinier cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The twinier shadows cast by the streetlights created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The twinier clouds in the sky made it look like a painting.
